UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Lysine Stapling Screening Provides Stable and Low Toxic Cationic Antimicrobial Peptides Combating Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria In Vitro and In Vivo
Literature.Author: Hu Y, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:LC50=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 186335(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa BNCC 125486(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli BNCC 133264(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µg/ml)
